Action.UseTTSTextExpression: Original: inside Getplayer, 5th action, which has a condition of ${lvar:DebuffList.size} = 6.
which is pointed to trigger MarkBind1
Changed: it points to Sorting mechanism first, which will then point to MarkBind1
Result: u have desired tank/DPS to pass the Mortal vow in the middle
where we decided, Bind = closer to Hrae,Ignore closer to center

Trigger.Name: $ReadMeV1.02$
Trigger.Description: This utilizes Telesto To mark players and thus needs that. For instructions on how to install telesto. https://github.com/paissaheavyindustries/Dalamud-Repo
